description: Experienced Software Engineer with expertise in designing, developing, and deploying scalable web applications using Python and Django. Strong knowledge of RESTful API development, database optimization, and cloud technologies.

Data Scientist skilled in building predictive models, analyzing large datasets, and implementing deep learning techniques. Proficient in Python, TensorFlow, and NLP techniques for extracting meaningful insights.
Passionate Frontend Developer specializing in building responsive web applications using React and Redux. Adept at writing clean and maintainable code in JavaScript and TypeScript.
Backend Developer with experience in designing and optimizing RESTful APIs and GraphQL services. Skilled in database management, microservices architecture, and cloud deployments.
AI Engineer with expertise in developing and fine-tuning Transformer-based NLP models. Skilled in Hugging Face, PyTorch, and deep learning frameworks for AI-powered applications.
